metadata.title: Tuesday, 20th November, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing when Ndola City Council will rehabilitate the following roads to bituminous standard
parts: (b)    Main Masala Market to Masala Secondary School; and
(c)    Ndola City Centre via Chipulukusu Township to Kanyanje Township.

questions.minister: Vice President when the following places in Mulobezi Parliamentary Constituency will be designated polling stations by the Electoral Commission of Zambia
